sentence.Network_en: In much of the popular commentary, this conclusion was stated in highly purposive terms.
sentence.Network_cn: 这类评论很多, 而其结论表述尤为明显.

sentence.Network_en: With a cross - sectional study design, 143 participants were recruited by purposive sampling.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用横断式研究设计, 经立意取样,招募143位高雄县美浓镇越南籍妇女参与本研究.

sentence.Network_en: Teaching is a purposive and rewarding activity.
sentence.Network_cn: 教书是一种有目的的、反思性的活动.

目录 1 2 3 ▪ ▪ ▪ 4 1简介Skopos这一术语通常用来指译文的目的，Skopos一词来源于希腊语目的“Skopos“。除了Skopos，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和.

means.word_mean: 1. having or showing or acting with a purpose or design;
